Fantasy Butterflies.NAME: Fantasy Butterflies
Fantasy Butterflies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL UpgradeAll Butterfly cards.

Dreamy Sakura.NAME: Dreamy Sakura
Dreamy Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Diaphaneity. NL UpgradeAll Sakura cards.

Faramita's Temptation.NAME: Faramita's Temptation
Faramita's Temptation.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Intangible and Fading for each X+ !M! HP that enemy has.

Sakura.NAME: Sakura
Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw 1 card. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Sakura (Seal).NAME: Sakura (Seal)
Sakura (Seal).DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw 1 card. NL Gain 4 Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Sakura (Suicide).NAME: Sakura (Suicide)
Sakura (Suicide).DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw 1 card. NL Gain 1 Phantom. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Sakura (Dormancy).NAME: Sakura (Dormancy)
Sakura (Dormancy).DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw 1 card. NL Gain 2 Diaphaneity. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Sakura (Bloom).NAME: Sakura (Bloom)
Sakura (Bloom).DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Draw 1 card. NL UpgradeAll Sakura cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Butterfly.NAME: Butterfly
Butterfly.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Butterfly (Ghost).NAME: Butterfly (Ghost)
Butterfly (Ghost).DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Apply 1 Constricted. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Butterfly (Swallowtail).NAME: Butterfly (Swallowtail)
Butterfly (Swallowtail).DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card., NL UpgradeAll Butterfly cards. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Butterfly (Deep Rooted).NAME: Butterfly (Deep Rooted)
Butterfly (Deep Rooted).DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! HP loss. Draw 1 card. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Butterfly (Delusion).NAME: Butterfly (Delusion)
Butterfly (Delusion).DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Apply 2 Diaphaneity. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Explore.NAME: Explore
Explore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discover 3. NL Gain 1 Diaphaneity. NL Exhaust.

Photo.NAME: Photo
Photo.DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to !M!. NL Exhaust.

Ghostdom Sakura.NAME: Ghostdom Sakura
Ghostdom Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 Sakura(Suicide) into your draw pile. NL UpgradeAll Sakura cards.

Gauzy Sakura.NAME: Gauzy Sakura
Gauzy Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 Sakura(Dormancy) into your draw pile. NL UpgradeAll Sakura cards.

Bloom.NAME: Bloom
Bloom.DESCRIPTION: UpgradeAll Sakura cards. NL Draw !M! cards.

Wandering Soul.NAME: Wandering Soul
Wandering Soul.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength if your HP greater than half. NL Otherwise, gain !M! Dexterity.

Linger over Flower.NAME: Linger over Flower
Linger over Flower.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Sakura and a Butterfly card. NL Shuffle 1 Sakura or a Butterfly into your draw pile. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

Cerasus Subhirtella.NAME: Cerasus Subhirtella
Cerasus Subhirtella.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Sakura card. Heal !M! HP. Draw 1 card. When you draw a Sakura, upgrade it. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Exhaust, RETAIN.

Suicide.NAME: Suicide
Suicide.DESCRIPTION: Set own HP to 1. NL Gain block equal to the HP you lost. NL Exhaust.
Suicide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Set own HP to 1. NL Gain Block equal to the HP you lost. NL Innate. Exhaust.

Monster Cherry Tree.NAME: Monster Cherry Tree
Monster Cherry Tree.DESCRIPTION: Transform all Derivate Sakura to Derivate Sakura with random effect. NL Hide.

Unknown Petal.NAME: Unknown Petal
Unknown Petal.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Sakura card. NL Heal !M!. Revive 1 random Sakura card. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Sakura Ward.NAME: Sakura Ward
Sakura Ward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle 1 Sakura(Seal) into your draw pile.
Sakura Ward.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle 1 Sakura(Seal) into your draw pile. Innate.

Bomb.NAME: Bomb
Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL When discarded, add a copy of this card to the discard pile. Exhaust.

Lunch.NAME: Lunch
Lunch.DESCRIPTION: Discover !M!. It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Chase The Sukhavati.NAME: Chase The Sukhavati
Chase The Sukhavati.DESCRIPTION: Discover 10. Gain 10 energy. End the turn after you play 10 more cards. Exhaust .

Childlike.NAME: Childlike
Childlike.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Derivate in hand. UpgradeAll Sakura and Butterfly cards. Revive a random card.

Showy Withering.NAME: Showy Withering
Showy Withering.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, UpgradeAll Sakura, then Retrieve 1 Sakura. NL Exhaust every 3rd Sakura you play.
Showy Withering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, UpgradeAll Sakura, then Retrieve 1 Sakura. NL Exhaust every 3rd Sakura you play. NL Innate.

Mini Ghostdom.NAME: Mini Ghostdom
Mini Ghostdom.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 energy, 1 Phantom, and 1 Diaphaneity. Place a random special Sakura and Butterfly into draw pile, UpgradeAll Sakura and Butterfly. Draw 1 card.

Postpone Bloom.NAME: Postpone Bloom
Postpone Bloom.DESCRIPTION: Count when upgrading Sakura. NL At next shuffle, UpgradeAll Sakura for count times and draw count cards.
Postpone Bloom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Count when upgrading Sakura. NL At next shuffle, UpgradeAll Sakura for count times and draw count cards. NL Innate.

Full Moon.NAME: Full Moon
Full Moon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Sakura cards. Gain Regen equal to the number of cards exhausted. Exhaust.

Mirror of Mind.NAME: Mirror of Mind
Mirror of Mind.DESCRIPTION: Record your HP in !M! Photos and shuffle them into your draw pile. Exhaust.

Explore Ghostdom.NAME: Explore Ghostdom
Explore Ghostdom.DESCRIPTION: Transform all cards except Derivate to Explore. NL Exhaust.
Explore Ghostdom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform all cards except Derivate to Explore+. NL Exhaust.

Unfulfilling Attachment.NAME: Unfulfilling Attachment
Unfulfilling Attachment.DESCRIPTION: Discover 1 10 times. Transform all Derivate Sakura with no extra effect to Sakura(Bloom).

Remain Here.NAME: Remain Here
Remain Here.DESCRIPTION: Gain 100 Fan. Reduce Fan by 10 at end of each turn. NL Hide.
Remain Here.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 100 Fan. Reduce Fan by 10 at end of each turn.

Full Inky Sakura.NAME: Full Inky Sakura
Full Inky Sakura.DESCRIPTION: After playing a Sakura, next Butterfly will add an extra 5% of MaxHP HP loss to all enemies. NL Hide.
Full Inky Sakura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After playing a Sakura, next Butterfly will add an extra 5% of MaxHP HP loss to all enemies.

Bury in The Template.NAME: Bury in The Template
Bury in The Template.DESCRIPTION: Playing this card !M! times will win the battle. Cards with the same name are counted separately. NL Hide.

Scenery of Papilio.NAME: Scenery of Papilio
Scenery of Papilio.DESCRIPTION: Copy all Derivate and place them into discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Scenery of Papilio.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy all Derivate and place them into draw pile. NL Exhaust, Hide.

The Inky Sakura.NAME: The Inky Sakura
The Inky Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Sakura card. If upgraded 30 times, deal 100% HP loss to all enemies. Otherwise Deal 5% HP loss. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Dream of Spring.NAME: Dream of Spring
Dream of Spring.DESCRIPTION: During the next !M! turns, all targets receive half damage and gain double heal. NL Hide.

Sakura Sakura.NAME: Sakura Sakura
Sakura Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Sakura card. Add 1 Sakura to your hand at the start of your next !M! turn(s). NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Ghost Lead.NAME: Ghost Lead
Ghost Lead.DESCRIPTION: Replace all your cards with rarer cards except Derivate
Ghost Lead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replace all your cards with rarer cards except Derivate. NL Innate

Home of Suicide.NAME: Home of Suicide
Home of Suicide.DESCRIPTION: Play all the Sakura and Butterfly that have been exhausted

Reunion after Death.NAME: Reunion after Death
Reunion after Death.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when you don't have cards with same name except Basic and Derivate. Exhaust all Basic and Derivate. Gain energy at the start of turn.

Reverse The Screen.NAME: Reverse The Screen
Reverse The Screen.DESCRIPTION: Exchange your Diaphaneity quantity with an enemy's. Gain Block of the difference between the quantities.
Reverse The Screen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exchange your Diaphaneity quantity with an enemy's. Gain Block of the difference between the stacks. Hide.

Unborn Light.NAME: Unborn Light
Unborn Light.DESCRIPTION: Give !M! Diaphaneity to ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage

Elegance.NAME: Elegance
Elegance.DESCRIPTION: Increase Diaphaneity by your Fan. NL UpgradeAll Sakura.
Elegance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase Diaphaneity by your Fan stacks. NL Place a Sakura into draw pile. UpgradeAll Sakura.

End of Faramita.NAME: End of Faramita
End of Faramita.DESCRIPTION: Only can be played when enemy's Diaphaneity is less than 20. Double its Diaphaneity. NL Ethereal

Gone.NAME: Gone
Gone.DESCRIPTION: Give Diaphaneity of your Diaphaneity to ALL enemies.

The Forgotten Winter.NAME: The Forgotten Winter
The Forgotten Winter.DESCRIPTION: At start of next turn, your Diaphaneity will not reduce. NL Ethereal.

The Nether.NAME: The Nether
The Nether.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to each enemy equal to its Diaphaneity quantity. NL Heal by Diaphaneity HP. NL Ethereal.
The Nether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal each enemies its own Diaphaneity stacks damage. NL Heal by Diaphaneity HP.

Unreal.NAME: Unreal
Unreal.DESCRIPTION: Select an enemy. If its Diaphaneity stacks is greater than 20, gain 1 Intangible. Otherwise, gain Diaphaneity equal to its Diaphaneity.

Stifle.NAME: Stifle
Stifle.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when the enemy's Diaphaneity is greater than 20. NL Reduce its Diaphaneity by 20 and deal damage of half its HP. Ethereal.
Stifle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when the enemy's Diaphaneity is greater than 20. NL Reduce its Diaphaneity by 20 and deal damage of half its HP.

Triple Snow.NAME: Triple Snow
Triple Snow.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, You will gain 3 times Diaphaneity from cards, NL Exhaust.

Nihility.NAME: Nihility
Nihility.DESCRIPTION: After playing the card, each card you play this turn will give !M! Diaphaneity to you and all enemies.
Nihility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL After playing the card, each card you play this turn will give !M! Diaphaneity to you and all enemies.

Death Dancing.NAME: Death Dancing
Death Dancing.DESCRIPTION: Give !M! Diaphaneity, NL Then deal damage equal to its Diaphaneity.

Phantom Butterflies.NAME: Phantom Butterflies
Phantom Butterflies.DESCRIPTION: Transform all Derivate Butterfly with no extra effect to Butterfly(Delusion).

Past Graveyard.NAME: Past Graveyard
Past Graveyard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, randomly give all targets 1~ !M! Diaphaneity.

Snowing Sakura.NAME: Snowing Sakura
Snowing Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Reduce 1 Fan. Gain (rounding down) 1 Diaphaneity per ALL Sakura, then 1 Energy per 5 Diaphaneity, then 1 Sakura(Bloom) per 3 Energy in card pile. Exhaust.
Snowing Sakura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce 1 Fan. Gain (rounding down) 1 Diaphaneity per ALL Sakura, then 1 Energy per 5 Diaphaneity, then 1 Sakura(Bloom) per 3 Energy in card pile. Reset.

Living to Die.NAME: Living to Die
Living to Die.DESCRIPTION: Diaphaneity of enemies will not reduce at turn start. NL When it reaches 100, give 1 Intangible and 1 Fading.

Supernatural Nether.NAME: Supernatural Nether
Supernatural Nether.DESCRIPTION: At next !M! turn start, increase Diaphaneity of everyone to 20. NL Exhaust.

Dancing Butterflies.NAME: Dancing Butterflies
Dancing Butterflies.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage of Fan stacks to all enemies. NL UpgradeAll Butterfly.
Dancing Butterflies.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your Fan stacks. NL Shuffle 1 Butterfly into your draw pile. UpgradeAll Butterfly cards.

Spear of Papilio.NAME: Spear of Papilio
Spear of Papilio.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! HP loss. NL Shuffle !M! Butterfly(Deep-Rooted) into your draw pile. NL UpgradeAll Butterfly cards.

Song of Papilio.NAME: Song of Papilio
Song of Papilio.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 Butterfly(Swallowtail) into your draw pile. NL UpgradeAll Butterfly cards.

Fondling of Papilio.NAME: Fondling of Papilio
Fondling of Papilio.DESCRIPTION: Retrieve !M! random Butterfly. NL UpgradeAll Butterfly cards !M! times.

Redemption of Death.NAME: Redemption of Death
Redemption of Death.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Revive 1 random Butterfly.

Gather the Spring.NAME: Gather the Spring
Gather the Spring.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Fan. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Shuffle 1 Sakura(Dormancy) into your draw pile.

Final of Final.NAME: Final of Final
Final of Final.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the difference between the number of cards in your draw pile and in your discard pile.
Final of Final.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the difference between the number of cards in your draw pile and in your discard pile. NL Hide.

Unpaved Way.NAME: Unpaved Way
Unpaved Way.DESCRIPTION: Only can be played when hand has at least 2 Derivate, Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

Serene Spring.NAME: Serene Spring
Serene Spring.DESCRIPTION: Kill enemy whose HP less than !D! %, NL otherwise deal !D! damage. Place Sakura(Dormancy) into draw pile. Ethereal, Hide.

Infinite Sin.NAME: Infinite Sin
Infinite Sin.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Butterfly cards. NL Deal decuple damage.
Infinite Sin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Butterfly cards. NL Deal decuple damage. Hide.

Butterflies Rainbow.NAME: Butterflies Rainbow
Butterflies Rainbow.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Butterfly card. NL Place Derivate Butterfly with random extra effect into draw pile, NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Butterflies in Dream.NAME: Butterflies in Dream
Butterflies in Dream.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Butterfly card. Replace all your hand to !M! Butterfly, up to 10. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Exhaust.

Dancing Soul.NAME: Dancing Soul
Dancing Soul.DESCRIPTION: Deal count of butterflies in hand damage. When draw Butterfly, place into hand. Exhaust.
Dancing Soul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal count of butterflies in hand damage. When draw Butterfly, place into hand. Exhaust, Innate.

Ghastly Dream.NAME: Ghastly Dream
Ghastly Dream.DESCRIPTION: Retrieve Butterfly up to fill your hand. NL This turn your Butterfly will be played for extra !M! times and Exhaust. NL You can't draw cards during the turn.

Infinite Reviving.NAME: Infinite Reviving
Infinite Reviving.DESCRIPTION: Reduce 1 Fan. Revive 1 Sakura and 1 Butterfly. When damaged, place into hand. Exhaust.
Infinite Reviving.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce 1 Fan. Revive 1 Sakura and 1 Butterfly. Revive 1 Derivate. When damaged, place into hand. Exhaust.

Float on Moon.NAME: Float on Moon
Float on Moon.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, UpgradeAll Butterfly cards 3 times. Draw 1 less card at the start of your turn. NL Your Derivate Butterfly will Deal 3 times damage and exhaust.
Float on Moon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, UpgradeAll Butterfly cards 3 times. Draw 1 less card at the start of your turn. NL Your Derivate Butterfly will Deal 3 times damage and exhaust. Innate.

Revive The Butterflies.NAME: Revive The Butterflies
Revive The Butterflies.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Fan. Set your HP to 1. NL Gain 3 Intangible. When you play a non-derivate, Revive 1 Butterfly

All Wander.NAME: All Wander
All Wander.DESCRIPTION: If you haven't played any other card this turn, end the turn, then skip your enemies' next turn. Otherwise Gain X Phantom.
All Wander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you haven't played any other card this turn, end the turn, then skip your enemies' next turn. Otherwise Gain X+1 Phantom.

Become Phantom.NAME: Become Phantom
Become Phantom.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Fan. NL At the start of each turn, gain 1 Phantom.
Become Phantom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Fan. NL At the start of each turn, gain 1 Phantom.

Sweet of Phantom.NAME: Sweet of Phantom
Sweet of Phantom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Phantom. NL Apply !M! Constricted. NL Draw !M! cards.

Steamed Phantom.NAME: Steamed Phantom
Steamed Phantom.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Phantom. NL Heal 50% of your missing HP.
Steamed Phantom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Phantom. NL Heal 75% of your missing HP.

Dark Wind.NAME: Dark Wind
Dark Wind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Phantom. NL Add 1 Soul and 1 Burn to your hand.

City of Death.NAME: City of Death
City of Death.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Phantom. NL Shuffle 1 Sakura(Suicide) into your draw pile.

Immigrant Phantom.NAME: Immigrant Phantom
Immigrant Phantom.DESCRIPTION: Lose half your Phantom. Apply Constricted equal to !M! times the amount of Phantom you lose.

Phantom Village.NAME: Phantom Village
Phantom Village.DESCRIPTION: Remove Constricted from ALL enemies. You gain that many Phantom. NL Draw 1 card for every !M! Phantom you gain this way.
Phantom Village.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove Constricted from ALL enemies. You gain that many Phantom. NL Draw 1 card for every !M! Phantom you gain this way. Hide.

Dying Butterflies.NAME: Dying Butterflies
Dying Butterflies.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Butterfly card. Gain !M! Phantom, up to 5. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset

Phantom Gift.NAME: Phantom Gift
Phantom Gift.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Phantom.

Trap Lamp.NAME: Trap Lamp
Trap Lamp.DESCRIPTION: Reduce !M! ghost. Place !M! Butterfly(Ghost) into draw pile. NL Next turn, place a copy of this into hand. Exhaust, Ethereal.
Trap Lamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce !M! ghost. Place !M! Butterfly(Ghost) into draw pile. NL Next turn, place a copy of this into hand. Exhaust.

Dying Sakura.NAME: Dying Sakura
Dying Sakura.DESCRIPTION: Counts as a Sakura card. For every 3 times upgraded, place 1 Soul into hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. Reset.

Dying Dream.NAME: Dying Dream
Dying Dream.DESCRIPTION: Reduce all ghost. NL Give Constricted of 5 times the amount to all enemies. Exhaust.
Dying Dream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce all ghost. NL Give Constricted of 5 times the amount to all enemies. Exhaust, Hide.

Ticket to Heaven.NAME: Ticket to Heaven
Ticket to Heaven.DESCRIPTION: Apply 10 Fading. Double any Constricted damage target enemy takes. Exhaust.
Ticket to Heaven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Apply 10 Fading. Double any Constricted damage target enemy takes. Exhaust.

The Way to Death.NAME: The Way to Death
The Way to Death.DESCRIPTION: Count the different costs you play each turn. Gain Phantom of their number at the start of next turn
